    • Uses of ISettings in com.penthera.virtuososdk.client

      Methods in com.penthera.virtuososdk.client that return ISettings 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ISettings  Virtuoso.getSettings()
      Retrieve a handle on the Settings.
      abstract ISettings  ISettings.resetAudioCodecsToDownload()
      Resets the audio codecs to download to the default configuration, which is all codecs
      abstract ISettings  ISettings.resetAutomaticDRMLicenseRenewalEnabled()
      Reset the automatic DRM license renewal to its default configutation, with is enabled
      abstract ISettings  ISettings.resetBatteryThreshold()
      Resets the battery threshold setting to the Virtuoso default configuration of 0.5.
      abstract ISettings  ISettings.resetCanAutoDeleteForSubscriptions()
      Reset default value for the auto-delete rule on subscribed feeds to True.
      abstract ISettings  ISettings.resetCellularDataQuota()
      Resets the cellular data quota setting to the Virtuoso default configuration of 100 MB.
      abstract ISettings  ISettings.resetCellularDataQuotaStart()
      Resets the cellular data quota start to be the current time and zeroes out the current cell usage.
      abstract ISettings  ISettings.resetDestinationPath()
      Resets the destination path setting to the Virtuoso default configuration.
      abstract ISettings  ISettings.resetErrorAssetOnDRMFail()
      Resets the current setting for whether a DRM failure at the start of download should cause the asset to be marked as failed, which will prevent further download.
      abstract ISettings  ISettings.resetFastPlaySegmentCount()
      Resets the segment count to use for fastplay assets
      abstract ISettings  ISettings.resetGlobalRequestHeaders()
      Removes the custom HTTP headers.
      abstract ISettings  ISettings.resetHeadroom()
      Resets the headroom setting to the Virtuoso default configuration of 1 GB.
      abstract ISettings  ISettings.resetHTTPConnectionTimeout()
      Resets the HTTP connection timeout to the Virtuoso default configuration.
      abstract ISettings  ISettings.resetHTTPSocketTimeout()
      Resets the HTTP socket timeout to the Virtuoso default configuration.
      abstract ISettings  ISettings.resetLanguagesSettings()
      Resets the languages settings to the default configuration, which is all languages
      abstract ISettings  ISettings.resetMaxAssetsForSubscriptions()
      Reset default value for the "max number of assets" rule on subscribed feeds to Integer.MAX_VALUE.
      abstract ISettings  ISettings.resetMaxBitrateForSubscriptions()
      Reset default value for the "max bitrate" rule on subscribed feeds to -1.
      abstract ISettings  ISettings.resetMaxDownloadConnections()
      Resets the max permissible concurrent network connections in the downloader to the default configuration.
      abstract ISettings  ISettings.resetMaxPermittedSegmentErrors()
      Resets the max permissible download errors on segments.
      abstract ISettings  ISettings.resetMaxStorageAllowed()
      Resets the max storage setting to the Virtuoso default configuration of 5 GB.
      abstract ISettings  ISettings.resetMimeTypeSettings()
      Resets the custom mime type settings
      abstract ISettings  ISettings.resetProgressUpdateByPercent()
      Resets the progress update percent interval to the Virtuoso default configuration of 1%.
      abstract ISettings  ISettings.resetProgressUpdateByTime()
      Resets the progress update time interval to the Virtuoso default configuration of 5000 ms.
      abstract ISettings  ISettings.resetProgressUpdatesPerSegment()
      Resets the progress update segment completion interval to the Virtuoso default configuration of 10.
      abstract ISettings  ISettings.resetRemoveNotificationOnPause()
      Resets the remove notification on pause to the default configuration, which is to remove it.
      abstract ISettings  ISettings.resetSegmentErrorHttpCode()
      Resets the HTTP code that is returned by the proxy when segments (for assets that have completed) are missing or have errors.
      abstract ISettings  ISettings.save()
      Save any modifications to the settings.
      abstract ISettings  ISettings.setAlwaysRequestPermission(boolean aValue)
      Always request permission.
      abstract ISettings  ISettings.setAudioCodecsToDownload(java.lang.String[] codecs)
      Sets the audio codec formats allowed for content downloads Applications can listen for changes to the configuration value by implementing the settingChanged method in Observers.IEngineObserver.
      abstract ISettings  ISettings.setAuthenticationErrorAsExternalLock(boolean val)
      Sets the engine to consider an HTTP authentication error as a blocking error caused by an external lock.
      abstract ISettings  ISettings.setAutomaticDrmLicenseRenewalEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Sets the enabled state of automatic drm license renewals Applications can listen for changes to the configuration value by implementing the settingChanged method in Observers.IEngineObserver.
      abstract ISettings  ISettings.setBatteryThreshold(float aThreshold)
      Change the setting for battery threshold.
      abstract ISettings  ISettings.setCanAutoDeleteForSubscriptions(boolean aAutoDelete)
      Set the default auto-delete rule for subscribed feeds.

      Change the setting for cellular quota.

      Change the setting for destination path.

      Set the current setting for whether a DRM failure at the start of download should cause the asset to be marked as failed, which will prevent further download.

      Sets the count for the number of segments to download for Fast Play assets.
      abstract ISettings  ISettings.setGlobalRequestHeaders(Bundle aHeaders)
      With this method, clients can configure the HTTP headers Virtuoso uses when making GET requests to download remote assets.
      abstract ISettings  ISettings.setHeadroom(long aHeadroom)
      Change the setting for headroom.
      abstract ISettings  ISettings.setHTTPConnectionTimeout(int aTimeout)
      Change the HTTP connection timeout value Virtuoso uses during download.
      abstract ISettings  ISettings.setHTTPSocketTimeout(int aTimeout)
      Change the HTTP socket timeout value Virtuoso uses during download.
      abstract ISettings  ISettings.setLanguagesSettings(LanguageSettings settings)
      Sets the languages allowed for content downloads Applications can listen for changes to the configuration value by implementing the settingChanged method in Observers.IEngineObserver.
      abstract ISettings  ISettings.setMaxAssetsForSubscriptions(int aMax)
      Sets global value for the "max number of assets" rule on subscription feeds.

      Set the default max segmented asset bitrate for feeds.

      abstract ISettings  ISettings.setProgressUpdateByPercent(int aPercent)
      Configure the frequency of progress updates during a download.
      abstract ISettings  ISettings.setProgressUpdateByTime(long aMilliseconds)
      Configure the frequency of progress updates during a download.
      abstract ISettings  ISettings.setProgressUpdatesPerSegment(int aNumberOfSegments)
      Deprecated. This method of controlling updates will not work any more as of 3.15.14, the method will be removed in a future release.
      abstract ISettings  ISettings.setRemoveNotificationOnPause(boolean remove)
      Sets the service to leave foreground mode and hide the notification when the engine is paused.
      abstract ISettings  ISettings.setSegmentErrorHttpCode(int code)
      Change the HTTP code that is returned by the proxy when segments (for assets that have completed) are missing or have errors.
